PyCBDÔÉÅ

This is the PyCBD checkerboard detection package.

Modules

PyCBD.checkerboard_detection

Submodule that contains the code for checkerboard detection with a modified Geiger detector.

PyCBD.checkerboard_enhancement

Submodule that contains the code for checkerboard enhancement with Gaussian processes.

PyCBD.logger_configuration

Module for basic configuration of the package logger.

PyCBD.pipelines

This module contains the checkerboard detection pipelines.
